description: She is a shy, affectionate teenage school student. An aspiring writer, Aya meets Manaka when he discovers a novel she is writing. The boys in Aya`s middle school pay no attention to her because of her ordinary appearance, despite her curvy figure. When she starts wearing contact lenses and lets her hair down, she gets lots of attention. Aya attends Izumizaka High with Manaka.
name: Toujou Aya
